author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Suedzucker FY Group Operating Result At EUR 440 Mln
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - SUEDZUCKER AG:
* SÜDZUCKER WITH FIRST OUTLOOK FOR FINANCIAL YEAR 2018/19 * FY 2017/18 GROUP REVENUES REACHED ABOUT EUR 7.0 (PREVIOUS YEAR: 6.5) BILLION
* FY GROUP OPERATING RESULT INCREASED TO ABOUT EUR 440 (PREVIOUS YEAR: 426) MILLION
* PROPOSES UNCHANGED DIVIDEND OF 0.45 EURO PER SHARE * EXPECTS GROUP REVENUES OF EUR 6.8 TO 7.1 BILLION FOR FINANCIAL YEAR 2018/19
* FOR 2018/19 SEES GROUP OPERATING RESULT TO DECREASE SIGNIFICANTLY TO EUR 100 TO 200 MILLION
* FOR 2018/19 SEES EBITDA LEVEL OF EUR 420 TO 520 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
